title: Food delivery and restaurant ordering
content:
# Swiggy App Guide

## Navigation
- **Bottom Navigation Bar**: Switch between **Food** (standard delivery), **99 store** (budget meals), and **Bolt** (ultra-fast 10-minute delivery).
- **Top Header**: Access your **Profile**, toggle the **"Buy One"** (Get One) mode, or switch between **Veg/Non-Veg** using the toggle switch.
- **Location**: Tap the address bar at the top left ("Home - [Address]") to change your delivery location.

## Search
- **Dish Search**: Type a dish name (e.g., "Biryani") in the main search bar to see specific variations like "Chicken Dum Biryani" or "Hyderabadi Chicken Biryani".
- **Restaurant Search**: Search results display restaurants with ratings (e.g., "4.1"), delivery time (e.g., "25-30 mins"), and distance.
- **Menu Search**: Inside a restaurant's page, use the **"Search for dishes"** bar to quickly find specific items on their menu.

## Common Actions
- **Filter Results**: On the search results page, use filters like **Sort by**, **99 store**, or **Bolt** (Food in 10 mins) to narrow down options.
- **Add to Cart**: On a restaurant menu, tap the green **ADD** button below an item. You can also view "Bestseller" tags to choose popular dishes.
- **Quick Delivery**: Select the **Bolt** tab or look for the "Bolt" lightning icon to find restaurants that deliver in 10-15 minutes.

## Tips
- **Budget Meals**: Use the **"Meals At ₹99"** or **"99 store"** section to find affordable food options.
- **Free Items**: Look for "FREE item for you!" banners on restaurant pages (e.g., "Hot Gulab Jamun" on orders above ₹399).
- **Discounts**: Check for blue discount tags like **"Extra ₹40 off"** or **"Flat ₹200 OFF"** prominently displayed on restaurant cards.
